title: Automation and API Engineer
salary: up to $15/ hour based on experience
job_overview:
We're looking to bring onboard an Automation and API contractor to kick off some internal projects. 
For phase 1 we will be focusing on Zapier/ Upgrade to see actual info workflows to our CRM ( Jobadder) 
There are several other projects with N8N and other LLM and Agentic builds. 
From there we will be looking at a potential custom ( low code) CRM to tailor some of our workflows

Overall we need someone who can dig in and create workflows and API's for several projects. Experience in the space and the ability to pick up new tools will be important. 

We do have the processes mapped and requirement completed so you will be working off those and communicating in Slack. 

You'll have experience with;
Zaiper/ Upgrade to see actual info 
N8N 
Vector database setup ( Pinecone or similar) 
API development 
Experience with Python and web scraping build would also be an advantage 
Other web based automation experience 
Experience with Power Automate would be ideal ( we have several Excel based projects in flight) 

There is a wide range of projects so those from a coding background would be ideal. 

We're ready to start this week 

Please outline at least 3 specific projects you have worked on with the above tech. 
That should highlight the business problem the project was designed to solve, how you went about solving that problem, the tech used and the outcome.
